description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Fire, Necrotic

Standard

+14 vs AC; 2d8+4 fire and necrotic damage.

Recharge 4-6 ✦ Necrotic

Standard

Ranged 10

+14 vs Will; 2d8+4 necrotic damage, and the target has no line of sight to anything more than 2 squares from it (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Implement, Necrotic

Standard

Ranged 5

+15 vs Reflex; 1d8+5 necrotic damage (crit 2d6+12 necrotic damage), and one ally within sight gains a +2 power bonus to its next attack roll against the target.

Encounter ✦ Necrotic

Standard

Sustain Minor

Aura 2; thick, writhing shadows surround Vandariel. She and any other shadow creatures within the aura gain concealment. In addition, enemies that enter or start their turns within the aura take 5 necrotic damage, and enemies (including flying ones) also treat the area within the aura as difficult terrain. Vandariel can sustain the aura as a minor action. However, the effect ends if she uses shadow jaunt or moves more than half her speed on her turn.

Daily ✦ Conjuration, Implement

Standard

Sustain Minor

Area wall 5 within 10; Vandariel conjures a wall of spinning blades that lasts until the end of her next turn. The wall can be 5 squares long and 2 squares high. The squares it occupies are difficult terrain. If a creature enters the barrier's space or starts its turn there, it takes 3d6 + 5 damage and ongoing 5 damage (save ends, with a -2 penalty to the saving throw).

Encounter ✦ Healing

Minor, Encounter

Close burst 5

Vandariel or an ally within the area spends a healing surge and regains 2d6 + 3 hit points. Vandariel can use this power twice per encounter, but only once per round.

Encounter ✦ Teleportation

Move

The shadar-kai teleports 3 squares and becomes insubstantial until the start of its next turn.

Encounter ✦ Healing

Free

Trigger: When vandariel's attack drops an enemy to 0 hit points

Vandariel or an ally within 5 squares of that enemy can spend a healing surge (with a +3 bonus to the hit points regained).

system.biography:
HP 202; Bloodied 101Init +8 | AP 1 | Save +2
AC 26Fort 21Ref 22Will 24
Speed 6
Ability ScoresStr 12 (+6)
Con 13 (+6)		Dex 16 (+8)
Int 19 (+9)		Wis 18 (+9)
Cha 18 (+9)
Languages Common, Elven, Supernal
Alignment Evil
Skills Acrobatics +13, Arcana +14, Heal +11, Religion +14, Stealth +15Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 19 | Insight 19

Equipment +2 symbol of despair, eladrin armor +2 .
